alert.note: Alert for Macon; Schley (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 9:46PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Macon and central Schley Counties through 1015 PM EDT... At 946 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Murrays Crossroads, or near Ellaville, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Murrays Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
